info.description: # dj-cref The output unit of Django generic view. ## Description This is the Python package whose name is **dj-cref** . **dj-cref** outputs a template of django generic view you wanted. ![demo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wiki/Canon11/dj-cref/images/djcref.gif) ## Features ### Output kinds - View - FormView - CreateView - UpdateView - DeleteView - DetailView - TemplateView - ListView - RedirectView ## Requirement - Python3 ## Usage ### Arguments * -type [kind of view] : Which type of generic view to output. * --initial : Whether to include import statements. ### Example Case1 ``` $ dj-cref -type FormView class MyFormView(FormView): # template_name = 'my_template.html' # form_class = 'MyForm' # success_url = '/my/success' def dispatch(self, request, *args, **kwargs): super().dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs) # please implement here def get_context_data(self, **kwargs): context = super().get_context_data(**kwargs) ... ``` Case2 ``` $ dj-cref -type FormView --initial from django.views import FormView class MyFormView(FormView): # template_name = 'my_template.html' # form_class = 'MyForm' # success_url = '/my/success' def dispatch(self, request, *args, **kwargs): super().dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs) ... ``` ## Installation ``` $ pip install dj-cref ``` ## Author [@Canon11](https://github.com/Canon11/)
info.name: dj-cref
info.summary: The django generic view output unit
info.html_description:
# dj-cref
The output unit of Django generic view.

## Description
This is the Python package whose name is **dj-cref** .
**dj-cref** outputs a template of django generic view you wanted.

![demo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wiki/Canon11/dj-cref/images/djcref.gif)


## Features
### Output kinds
- View
- FormView
- CreateView
- UpdateView
- DeleteView
- DetailView
- TemplateView
- ListView
- RedirectView

## Requirement
- Python3

## Usage
### Arguments
* <code>-type [kind of view]</code> : Which type of generic view to output.
* <code>--initial</code> : Whether to include import statements.

### Example
Case1
```
$ dj-cref -type FormView
class MyFormView(FormView):
# template_name = 'my_template.html'
# form_class = 'MyForm'
# success_url = '/my/success'

def dispatch(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
super().dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)
# please implement here

def get_context_data(self, **kwargs):
context = super().get_context_data(**kwargs)
...
```

Case2
```
$ dj-cref -type FormView --initial
from django.views import FormView


class MyFormView(FormView):
# template_name = 'my_template.html'
# form_class = 'MyForm'
# success_url = '/my/success'

def dispatch(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
super().dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)
...
```

## Installation
```
$ pip install dj-cref
```

## Author
[@Canon11](https://github.com/Canon11/)
